title: FS: Hart PSA 4, Jones EPDG Raw, and Lindaman Sovereign Raw

posts.post_title: FS: Hart PSA 4, Jones EPDG Raw, and Lindaman Sovereign Raw
posts.post_content:
Selling some duplicates:

Tom Jones, St Louis, Raw, EPDG Back = $SOLD

Jones has what looks like pencil marks on the front of the card, as well as very worn corners and wrinkles throughout.  A PSA 1 with lots of wrinkles that also looks really rough sold back in 2015 for $150.

All prices are PayPal FF net to me, and includes shipping.

First I'll take it trumps all on-going negotiations.  

Please email me at [url]frankbev29@yahoo.com[/url][/email] with any questions.
